snippet: If you do not have time to experiment with each new DVD you play, others seem to have the time and inclination to ferret out the hidden treats left by the disc's creators.
abstract: If you do not have time to experiment with each new DVD you play, others seem to have the time and inclination to ferret out the hidden treats left by the disc's creators.

headline.main: Q&A: Easter Eggs Hunts for Movie Fans
